feature.label: A PDE Target Platform
feature.description: Empty feture augmented with a p2.inf to be able to use the RAP and other runtimes in .target file in Tycho. Indeed due to the RAP Hack "A.PDE.Target.Platform Cannot be installed into the IDE [0.0.0]" Tycho is not able to create the target platform from the .target because of the lacking A.PDE.Target.Platform dependency. See the following links for more information - http://www.eclipse.org/forums/index.php?t=msg&goto=635186&S=02fccd32953bc10f6ffa718b48468225 - https://issues.sonatype.org/browse/TYCHO-477 - https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=342808
